event.title: 4Shared | How to Download Files From 4Shared
event.description:
4shared: how to download mp3 songs and other formats
October 25, 2016
Share on Facebook Tweet on Twitter
The 4shared is a cloud service available in two versions: free and paid. With the program, it is possible to perform music downloads in several formats, such as MP3, WMA and Wave. To find a file, the user can type in the search tool a specific title. In this way, the use of the service becomes faster and without results incompatible with the search term. To use the app for free, you can perform a temporary login.

4Shared Pro: 14 Premium Benefits You Can Test

4shared: how to download mp3 songs and other formats (Photo: Diving / 4Shared)4shared: how to download mp3 music and other formats (Reuters / 4shared )
TechTudo application : Get the best tips and latest news on your mobile

Step 1. Access the 4shared and click the “Music” option on the platform of the home screen;

Access to 4Shared music tab (Photo: Reproduction / Marvin Costa)Access to 4Shared music tab (Photo: Reproduction / Marvin Costa)
Step 2. Enter the name of the song you want to find and press “Enter”;

Search for a song in 4Shared’s search tool (Photo: Reproduction / Marvin Costa)Search for a song in 4Shared’s search tool (Photo: Reproduction / Marvin Costa)
Step 3. Note that the same song will appear in different formats along the search results list. Choose a format and click on the name of the song, as shown in the image below;

Search results for music files on 4Shared (Photo: Reproduction / Marvin Costa)Search results for music files on 4Shared (Photo: Reproduction / Marvin Costa)
Step 4. Click the “Download” option;

Option to download music in 4Shared (Photo: Reproduction / Marvin Costa)Option to download music in 4Shared (Photo: Reproduction / Marvin Costa)
Step 5. Click the “Free download” option;

Free 4Shared download option (Photo: Reproduction / Marvin Costa)Free 4Shared download option (Photo: Reproduction / Marvin Costa)
Step 6. Use one of the social networking options to perform a temporary login to download the file. In this example, we will use one account Facebook . Click the option you want to proceed;

Option for temporary login on 4Shared through social networks (Photo: Reproduction / Marvin Costa)Option for temporary login on 4Shared through social networks (Photo: Reproduction / Marvin Costa)
Step 7. Wait for the 20-second countdown to finish so your download starts automatically. If this does not happen, click the “Download file” option;

Before starting the download, wait until the file is prepared by 4Shared (Photo: Reproduction / Marvin Costa)Before starting the download, wait until the file is prepared by 4Shared (Photo: Reproduction / Marvin Costa)
Step 8. Set the location where the file will be downloaded to your computer and click the “Save” option to start the download.

Download screen of a song from 4Shared to the computer (Photo: Reproduction / Marvin Costa)Download screen of a song from 4Shared to the computer (Photo: Reproduction / Marvin Costa)
Ready. Take the hint to find music in the format that is compatible with your devices.

Is 4Shared for mobile phones good? See what users are commenting on the TechTudo Forum.
